entry.title: Star Wars: Machete Order
entry.content: The nerdiest and probably best thing you're going to read today: An alternative order to watch all the Star Wars movies. Well, except episode I, which is left out of this order because it is kind of crappy. It's very well-argued too, and entirely readable just for the assorted Star Wars nerdery. I so totally adore this idea. Now I just need to find some time to re-watch all of the movies. Again. In the right order this time. Permalink

entry.title: Star Wars on Earth
entry.content: Photos of places on our little planet that look like Star Wars sets, with some characters thrown in for good measure. Permalink

entry.title: The Economics of Death Star Planet Destruction
entry.content: An in-depth analysis of the Empire's economy. I tend to do this kind of overthinking a lot, it's a pretty annoying trait to have when you're trying to write story lines. Permalink

entry.title: BEN KENOBI: PRIVATE JEDEYE
entry.content: Seltsam und großartiges Star-Wars-Referenzgewitter. Kann man nicht erklären, muss man sehen. Just strange. And awesome. Permalink
